attributes.action: protect consumers from personal grievances between big business. ie SKY vs VIRGIN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Murdock and Branson are in disagreement and the losers will be the millions of consumers who have paid for a service. This has happened with no real consultation and in total disregard of the consumer. The Office of Fair Trading and the competition commission exists to prevent this kind of behavior yet as the unchecked growth of Tesco's shows they are not effectively empowered. We propose this government gives both organisations the powers to police big business effectively.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
